      • hasMember

        public static final boolean hasMember(long user)
        Gets whether the table has an entry for the given member.
        Parameters:
        user - the Discord unique long ID.
        Returns:
        true if an entry exists; false if the map is null or the member isn't a key.

      • initMember

        public static final boolean initMember(long user)
        Populates the table with a new entry for the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - the Discord unique long ID.
        Returns:
        true if there were no errors; false if there were.

      • getInfractionHistory

        public static final java.util.ArrayList<InfractionEntry> getInfractionHistory(long user)
        Gets the user's infraction history.
        Parameters:
        user - the Discord unique long ID.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of InfractionEntry's. Returns null if either the map itself is null, or the InfractionData object is null.

      • getWarnCount

        public static final int getWarnCount(long user)
        Gets the number of times the user has been warned.
        Parameters:
        user - the Discord unique long ID.
        Returns:
        the warn count as an int. Returns -1 if the map is null.

      • warnUser

        public static final boolean warnUser(long user,
                                     long time,
                                     java.lang.String reason)
        Sets the user's warn status and increments their warn count.
        Parameters:
        user - the Discord unique long ID.
        time - the epoch time the user was warned.
        reason - the reason the user is being warned.
        Returns:
        true if there were no errors; false if either the map itself is null, or if the user's InfractionData list is null.

        Returns:

        public static final int getMuteCount(long user)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        an int. Returns -1 if the map is null.

      • setMuted

        public static final boolean setMuted(long user,
                                     boolean b)
        Updates a user's muted status.
        Parameters:
        user - the Discord unique long ID.
        b - true if muted; false if not.
        Returns:
        true if there were no errors; false if either the map itself was null, or if the user's InfractionData list is null.

      • muteUser

        public static final boolean muteUser(long user,
                                     long issueTime,
                                     int muteDuration,
                                     java.lang.String reason)
        Sets a the user's muted status to true and increments their mute count.
        Parameters:
        user - the Discord unique long ID.
        issueTime - the epoch time the user was muted.
        muteDuration - the amount of time in seconds the user should be muted for.
        reason - the reason the user is being muted.
        Returns:
        true if there were no errors; false if either the map itself was null, or if the user's InfractionData list is null.

        Gets how many times the user has been kicked.
        Parameters:
        user - the Discord unique long ID.
        Returns:
        an int; returns -1 if the map or the user's InfractionData list is null.
